messages.title: 5 REASONS TO VOTE GREEN
messages.content: Vote Green for communities, stable economy, public services, peace, environmental care, democracy, and change.

messages.title: Time to Vote Green (again)
messages.content: Historical voting patterns show Greens overtaking LibDems and Tories. A call to action to change politics by voting for the Scottish Green Party.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Committed to community, stable economy, just tax, affordable energy, public services, decent pensions and fair benefits.
Caring for the planet and securing the future for children and the environment.
Founded on principles dedicated to ecology, equality, democracy and liberty.
Striving for peace by working against nuclear weapons and supporting global justice.
Acting for change, standing up for everyone and not just for more of the same.

mentions.tacticalSituation: In the European Elections in this constituency we overtook LibDems and Tories.

issues.economy: Committed to community, a stable economy, just tax, affordable energy, public services, decent pensions and fair benefits.
issues.environment: Caring for the planet - the only party serious about positive, practical action to secure the future for our children and our environment
issues.governance: Founded on principles - dedicated to ecology, equality, democracy, and liberty.

leaflet.personalStatement: Vote for Dr Martin Bartos to clean up politics.

images.caption: Dr Martin Bartos - your Green MP candidate.

leaflet.additionalNotes: The only wasted vote is one for a party you don’t believe in.
